QuestData.Title: The Twilight Overlook
QuestData.Description: The dragon they're speaking of is Abyssion, $n. It's not going to be easy to get the fragment off of him.$B$BMeet with Mylra again. She is operating nearby at the Twilight Overlook.$B$BShe will tell you what our next move will be.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Mylra has taken the Twilight Overlook. Meet with her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Stormcaller Mylra at the Twilight Overlook in Deepholm.
QuestData.RewardText: So we're going to have to take on Abyssion to get the fragment? This operation just got a whole lot more difficult all of a sudden.
